prompt: <description>**Instructions to construct the first part** **Part 1: A CAD model of a rectangular prism with a curved top and a flat bottom. The prism has a cylindrical base and a cylindrical top. The top and bottom of the prism are connected by a straight line. The prism is centered on a vertical axis. The height of the prism is twice the width of the base. The width of the base is equal to the length of the straight line connecting the top and bottom of the prism.** Begin by creating a new coordinate system with the following properties: - Euler Angles: [0.0, 0.0, -90.0] - Translation Vector: [0.0, 0.0891, 0.0] Next, create the sketch for the first part on the plane defined by the coordinate system. The sketch contains one face (face\\_1) with two loops (loop\\_1 and loop\\_2). Loop\\_1 is a closed loop and consists of six arcs (arc\\_1 to arc\\_6) and is defined as follows: - arc\\_1: Start Point [0.0, 0.2201], Mid Point [0.0578, 0.0958], End Point [0.1559, 0.0] - arc\\_2: Start Point [0.1559, 0.0], Mid Point [0.3961, 0.2328], End Point [0.7273, 0.1866] - arc\\_3: Start Point [0.7273, 0.1866], Mid Point [0.7464, 0.264], End Point [0.749, 0.3436] - arc\\_4: Start Point [0.749, 0.3436], Mid Point [0.5188, 0.459], End Point [0.4146, 0.6945] - arc\\_5: Start Point [0.4146, 0.6945], Mid Point [0.3465, 0.6966], End Point [0.2791, 0.6865] - arc\\_6: Start Point [0.2791, 0.6865], Mid Point [0.2373, 0.3948], End Point [0.0, 0.2201] Loop\\_2 is a closed loop and consists of one circle (circle\\_1) and is defined as follows: - circle\\_1: Center [0.3689, 0.3161], Radius 0.0168 The sketch is complete and can be scaled using the scaling parameter `sketch_scale` with a value of 0.749. Next, transform the scaled 2D sketch into a 3D sketch using the euler angles and translation vector from the coordinate system. Finally, extrude the 2D sketch to generate the 3D model with the following properties: - extrude\\_depth\\_towards\\_normal: 0.0891 - extrude\\_depth\\_opposite\\_normal: 0.0 The final intermediate part is now complete. Its length, width and height are as follows: - length: 0.749 - width: 0.0891 - height: 0.749 The part is created using a `NewBodyFeatureOperation` boolean operation, resulting in the creation of a new solid body.</description>
